33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Al-Mustawrid bin Shaddad Al-Fihri reported that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:"I was sent in advance of the Hour, so that I precede it like this precedes this." (Indicating) with his index and middle fingers

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " بُعِثْتُ أَنَا وَالسَّاعَةَ كَهَاتَيْنِ " . يَعْنِي السَّبَّابَةَ وَالْوُسْطَى
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Prophet's(ﷺ) Saying: "The Hour And I Have Been Dispatched Like These Two" Meaning The Index And Middle Fingers
